Welcome to my site, my name is
Julian Cantera
Front-End Developer

Building things that live in computers is what I love to do. I am a fast learner, proactive, and team player individual with expertise in web development and UI components.

Check out all my skills!
julian.c.dev@gmail.com

About Me

I have always been interested in computers and web development. However, my professional career took a different path (History and Tourism). In 2018, I decided to switch careers and turn something that I always did as a hobby into something more, a new career, a new purpose in lifefocus on my passion for IT.

I began working as a Software QA tester as part of an Agile development team, which allowed me to understand how it works multi-disciplinary teams of engineers, designers, producers, and clients on a daily basis. At the same time, I also began learning to use Front-End technologies at professional level.

During the last two terrible years, the current situation has allowed me to have extra time, giving me a wonderful opportunity to dedicate almost full time to improving my development skills and keep learning new tech, and I still continue on this journey. Evidencing my motivation and drive, my specialism in IT is self taught, and have complemented this by taking part in specialist courses.

For example, I've recently joined an Advanced JavaScript course with the City of London University and will be adding more projects based on React library.
